title: The Villain
body:
Can we please get rid of the giant sword floating around, by all means have it there when you are close to garen, but its so annoying when you are in bot or mid lane and have this giant thing floating around cluttering your screen, its hard enough to keep track of all the buffs and de-buffs affecting you without having half of them blocked by a giant sword that unless you happen to be in melee range of garen does NOTHING, if you are doing well in bot lane and you get the sword, it can be a good 10 minutes before you even see garen and you have to deal that whole time with having the sword following you around.
it must be annoying for garen too, to have a little head next to him all the time.

why not only have the head/sword when those two champs are near enough to each other and have sight of each other. (like a nocturne's ult radius distance away) and when you aren't close to each other just have a little icon on the buff/debuff board thing. have the sword pop up when you become the villain but go away unless you are near garen.

replies.body: wtf how its not huge don't zoom in or make your overlay smaller wow
